text: A health professional shall remain covered by § 3-1201.04 if the following criteria are met:
historical:

Legislative History of Laws

For legislative history of D.C. Law 12-281, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 24-261.01.

DC CODE § 24-261.02b

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: The health professional is transferred from employment by the District government to employment by a private operator to perform essentially the same services as the person performed while employed by the District government and continues to perform such services for the duration of his or her employment by a private operator; and
The health professional is covered by § 3-1201.04.

division.text: Criminal Law and Procedure and Prisoners.

heading.catch_text: Health professionals transferring from District government employment to employment by a private operator.
